hero.badge: Explore the Intersection of Technology and Society
hero.subtitle: Bitcoin is not just a technological innovation, but a window into understanding how human society operates. Through nine different perspectives, explore the nature of trust, value, and power.

perspectives.title: Nine Perspectives
perspectives.subtitle: Deep Understanding of Bitcoin
perspectives.description: Each perspective is a window that allows you to understand Bitcoin's deeper meaning and social impact from different dimensions.

cta.title: Ready to Start Exploring?
cta.subtitle: Begin with any perspective that interests you and gradually build a comprehensive understanding of Bitcoin

trust.title: Rethinking Trust
trust.description: Understanding how to build trust systems without relying on centralized institutions

value.title: The Nature of Value
value.description: Exploring how value is created, stored, and transferred, and the meaning of scarcity

power.title: Restructuring Power
power.description: Witnessing how technology changes power distribution, achieving true decentralized governance

future.title: Future of Money
future.description: Foreseeing the financial infrastructure and global value flow system of the digital age

learningPath.title: Learning Path
learningPath.subtitle: Master Bitcoin Knowledge Step by Step
learningPath.description: We've designed a 10-week learning plan to build a comprehensive understanding of Bitcoin from multiple disciplinary perspectives.

studyGuide.title: Study Guide
studyGuide.subtitle: Master Effective Learning Methods and Practical Techniques

articlesPage.subtitle: Explore Bitcoin from multiple dimensions to understand its profound impact on money, economics, technology, and society

cta.title: Start Your Bitcoin Learning Journey
cta.subtitle: Master Bitcoin knowledge progressively from basic concepts to deep understanding

home.title: Bitcoin Primer - Understanding Bitcoin from Multiple Perspectives
home.description: Deep dive into Bitcoin from nine disciplinary perspectives: money, banking, economics, computer science, game theory, energy, politics, philosophy, and law. Systematic learning path and comprehensive educational resources.
home.keywords: Bitcoin,Bitcoin education,cryptocurrency,blockchain,decentralization,digital currency,Bitcoin learning,monetary economics,cryptography,distributed systems,proof of work

money.title: Money Perspective - Bitcoin Primer
money.description: Understanding Bitcoin through the lens of money: exploring the nature of money, monetary history, and how Bitcoin redefines digital currency with revolutionary features.
money.keywords: Bitcoin money,digital currency,monetary history,currency evolution,decentralized money,Bitcoin value,monetary properties,scarcity,sound money

banking.title: Banking Perspective - Bitcoin Primer
banking.description: Exploring how Bitcoin challenges traditional banking systems, enables decentralized value transfer and storage, and empowers individuals to be their own bank.
banking.keywords: Bitcoin banking,decentralized finance,self custody,private key management,Bitcoin wallets,peer-to-peer payments,financial sovereignty,be your own bank

economics.title: Economics Perspective - Bitcoin Primer
economics.description: Analyzing Bitcoin through Austrian economics: economic model, deflationary characteristics, store of value properties, and impact on global economic systems.
economics.keywords: Bitcoin economics,Austrian school,deflation,store of value,economic incentives,Bitcoin halving,supply and demand,monetary policy

computerScience.title: Computer Science Perspective - Bitcoin Primer
computerScience.description: Deep dive into Bitcoin's technical architecture: blockchain, cryptography, consensus mechanisms, network protocols, and core technical components.
computerScience.keywords: blockchain technology,Bitcoin protocol,cryptography,hash functions,digital signatures,proof of work,P2P network,Merkle trees,distributed systems

gameTheory.title: Game Theory Perspective - Bitcoin Primer
gameTheory.description: Analyzing Bitcoin's incentive mechanisms, Nash equilibrium, Byzantine Generals Problem solutions, and mining game theory strategies.
gameTheory.keywords: Bitcoin game theory,incentive mechanisms,Nash equilibrium,Byzantine fault tolerance,mining incentives,game strategies,consensus games

energy.title: Energy Perspective - Bitcoin Primer
energy.description: Exploring Bitcoin mining energy consumption, renewable energy utilization, energy monetization, and positive impact on global energy systems.
energy.keywords: Bitcoin mining,energy consumption,renewable energy,green mining,energy monetization,electricity markets,carbon neutral,sustainable mining

politics.title: Politics Perspective - Bitcoin Primer
politics.description: Analyzing Bitcoin's political philosophy, decentralized governance, monetary sovereignty, regulatory challenges, and impact on international politics.
politics.keywords: Bitcoin politics,monetary sovereignty,decentralized governance,financial freedom,regulatory policy,geopolitics,currency weaponization

philosophy.title: Philosophy Perspective - Bitcoin Primer
philosophy.description: Exploring philosophical foundations of Bitcoin: libertarianism, cypherpunk ethos, trust minimization, individual sovereignty, and core ideological principles.
philosophy.keywords: Bitcoin philosophy,cypherpunk,individual sovereignty,libertarianism,trustless systems,digital freedom,privacy rights

law.title: Law Perspective - Bitcoin Primer
law.description: Examining Bitcoin's legal status, property rights, regulatory frameworks, compliance requirements, and challenges to traditional legal systems.
law.keywords: Bitcoin law,cryptocurrency regulation,digital assets,legal framework,compliance requirements,property rights,tax treatment

learningPath.title: Learning Path - Bitcoin Primer
learningPath.description: Systematic Bitcoin learning path from fundamental concepts to advanced topics, helping you master comprehensive Bitcoin knowledge.
learningPath.keywords: Bitcoin learning,learning path,Bitcoin tutorial,systematic learning,knowledge framework,study plan,advanced guide,Bitcoin education

studyGuide.title: Study Guide - Bitcoin Primer
studyGuide.description: Bitcoin learning methods, resource recommendations, practical advice to help you efficiently learn and deeply understand Bitcoin.
studyGuide.keywords: learning methods,study resources,Bitcoin books,video tutorials,podcast recommendations,learning community,practical guide

resources.title: Resources - Bitcoin Primer
resources.description: Comprehensive collection of Bitcoin learning resources: books, papers, videos, podcasts, tools, communities, and educational materials.
resources.keywords: Bitcoin resources,learning materials,technical documentation,whitepaper,development tools,community forums,data analysis

articles.title: Articles - Bitcoin Primer
articles.description: In-depth Bitcoin articles exploring technical implementations, economic theories, philosophical implications, and practical applications.
articles.keywords: Bitcoin articles,technical analysis,economic theory,blockchain technology,cryptocurrency research,Bitcoin philosophy,digital currency

buyBitcoin.description: Learn how to buy Bitcoin safely: ETF investment, major exchanges including Interactive Brokers, Binance, Coinbase, Kraken detailed guides.

about.description: Bitcoin Primer is dedicated to providing comprehensive, in-depth, multi-perspective Bitcoin educational resources.
